snippet.textDisplay: Dark Dawn was a disappointment. It was undeniably Golden Sun, but there was something off about it. I also didn't like how they spent hours talking about the old characters (like Ivan and Mia), but they never actually showed up in the game!

snippet.textDisplay: Dark Dawn is quite average - the difficulty curve is off, the world closes off behind you, the beginning is a bizarre, cliched and un-engaging mess - and on top of all that, it's as talky is the first two games. Considering its legacy, Dark Dawn is a tragedy.
snippet.textOriginal: Dark Dawn is quite average - the difficulty curve is off, the world closes off behind you, the beginning is a bizarre, cliched and un-engaging mess - and on top of all that, it's as talky is the first two games. Considering its legacy, Dark Dawn is a tragedy.

snippet.textDisplay: Golden Sun. Oh man. I remember I took my cousin's copy of his game because I couldn't believe how good this game was. But he found it and took it away from me haha. But now I found it for really cheap and I am glad I own the game xD.

snippet.textDisplay:
The second I saw this in my subscribed list, I knew the nostalgia would hit me like a tonne of bricks. 
From the number of times I have played this game, and it's first sequel, I don't need to actually play the games to relive the fantasy. The stories of Isaac and Felix are always churning around in my imagination, and no other game series to date has had such a lasting effect on me.
Truly, two of the greatest things to happen to the video gaming industry.
snippet.textOriginal:
The second I saw this in my subscribed list, I knew the nostalgia would hit me like a tonne of bricks. 
From the number of times I have played this game, and it's first sequel, I don't need to actually play the games to relive the fantasy. The stories of Isaac and Felix are always churning around in my imagination, and no other game series to date has had such a lasting effect on me.
Truly, two of the greatest things to happen to the video gaming industry.

snippet.textDisplay: This game defined my childhood. I love Sakuraba's music largely because of this game. The best song was probably Saturos' battle theme but the Vale town theme screams beginning village music. Great pick.
snippet.textOriginal: This game defined my childhood. I love Sakuraba's music largely because of this game. The best song was probably Saturos' battle theme but the Vale town theme screams beginning village music. Great pick.

snippet.textDisplay: I don't like the GS games myself.
snippet.textOriginal: I don't like the GS games myself.

snippet.textDisplay: Playing this game was very memorable, I couldn't believe how nice it looked and sounded for a portable game, and an RPG too. Loved it. I also really liked Golden Sun 2, but at that point I already knew what to expect. I have yet to play the new one on the DS.
snippet.textOriginal: Playing this game was very memorable, I couldn't believe how nice it looked and sounded for a portable game, and an RPG too. Loved it. I also really liked Golden Sun 2, but at that point I already knew what to expect. I have yet to play the new one on the DS.
